channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- PowerShell Core
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- PowerShell Core

item.title: CVE-2018-8292|2024-08-05T06:54:36.373Z -- microsoft -- powershell%20core
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in .NET Core when authentication information is inadvertently exposed in a redirect, aka ".NET Core Information Disclosure Vulnerability." This affects .NET Core 2.1, .NET Core 1.0, .NET Core 1.1, PowerShell Core 6.0.
